author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials seized Rs. 4 lakh from three persons in as many number of cases at Dharapuram on Sunday.

From Kerala

Tahsildar (Dharapuram) M. Krishnaveni said that of the three persons, one was a Kerala businessman coming with cash of Rs. 1 lakh from Thrissur.

The other two persons from whom cash was seized were from Karur district, the Tahsildar said.

No documents

The cash were seized as none of the three could produce any valid documents to prove the sources of the amount.
title: Election officials seize Rs. 4 lakh from three persons
